website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward bronzer by a popular luxury brand that gives you a healthy, natural glow.
pros: Matte finish of this bronzer makes it look natural
Generous size, so it will last a long time
Subtle pigmentation is good for daytime
cons: Can’t be used for complicated makeup looks because the pigment isn’t rich enough

customer_reviews.title: Best bronzer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT bronzer!!! It’s not shimmery or super heavy — meaning you can add on and control how much you want without going overboard. I’ve tried other fancy more expensive brands and they suck! compared to this one. Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: nestar

customer_reviews.title: Not shimmery, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bronzer because it’s matte. So many bronzers have minerals in them which make the skin look shiny or shimmery. I don’t like to look like I have makeup on so this is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: ADK

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sculpting facial contours
customer_reviews.text: Great for creating cheekbones and sculpting the face and neck area. It would be too dark for me to use all over my face/neck area as my skin tone is pretty fair.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. West

customer_reviews.title: broken smashbox
customer_reviews.text: I received my item and the item wasn't wrap properly and one of smashbox has broken from inside
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Very drying on my skin ,I moisturize my face with very expensive skincare products ,I do an overnight mask and eyepads ,as soon as I start to apply the bronzer you can see the dryness immediately, I like a matte bronzer but not one that makes my skin look so dry ,I like smashbox products I guess this bronzer just doesn't work with my skin ..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use as a blush
customer_reviews.text: I have an olive complexion and many blushes are too pale or too pink for me. I love this bronzer because it gives me the cheek color I am looking for and it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: blueflower

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: great product, ive bought 3 now and have no plans to change any time soon!
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i guess it is fine. i dont have anything else to compare it with. use this occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not like it, makes fce look dry, color a little too orange
customer_reviews.author: Linda DeFever

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to bronzer, I bought this when my last one was empty. Arrived in perfect condition in its original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Compagno

product_meta.title: Smashbox Bronze Lights, Deep Matte, 0.29 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Deep MatteAn eight-hour wear, refined bronzer with coated pigments that make it easier to blend. This bronzer enhances your skin tone so that you look like you've spent time in the California sun. Infused with Photoset Mineral Complex so that it stays put for up to eight hours, this formula ensures that the skin looks perfectly sun kissed. Use it to create a natural, fresh-faced bronzed look all year round, or use it to contour by sweeping it under the cheekbones, jawline, and along the inner bridge of the nose for a slimming effect.
feature_bullets: An eight-hour wear, refined bronzer with coated pigments that make it easier to blend.
This bronzer enhances your skin tone so that you look like you've spent time in the California sun.
Infused with Photoset Mineral Complex so that it stays put for up to eight hours, this formula ensures that the skin looks perfectly sun kissed.
